message.content: The phrase "double duty" typically means doing two jobs or tasks at the same time. Since this person is technically doing two duties or tasks, it would make sense to use the phrase "double duty" to describe their role. Therefore, the answer is (B) no, double duty is not an incorrect phrase for the host of Dancing With The Stars.
